title: Joshua Graham Lynn on the 'Vast Ring of Influence' in American Politics | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Joshua Graham Lynn on the 'Vast Ring of Influence' in American Politics | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: The co-founder of non-profit organisation RepresentUs is fighting corruption at the state level in hopes that it will change the landscape that allowed President Trump’s election.Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
description:
The co-founder of non-profit organisation RepresentUs is fighting corruption at the state level in hopes that it will change the landscape that allowed President Trump’s election.

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
